creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: blue with rust, variegated blue and cream stripes on one long side; central strip in same colors with plain and decorative geometric pattern stripes; red trim at short ends
medium: Wool; woven with resist dyed ikat and warp patterning
title: Man's long wrap
